name: Ember Design
description:
Established in 1996, Ember Design LLC applies a thoughtful approach and contemporary sensibility to communications design, with particular expertise in annual and corporate reports, publications, brochures, direct mail, business systems and advertising.
Now located in Seattle, Ember Design also continues to serve its loyal clients in the Southwest. A partial list of clients served includes APS/Pinnacle West, Arizona State University, and The Phoenician Resort.
